attributes.title: CRO Automation & building your (de)centralized CRO team
attributes.summary: Live recorded at CH2021: We discuss some CRO automations and if you should build a centralized or decentralized CRO team
attributes.description: Guest 1: Arnout van Scherpenzeel URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/arnout-van-scherpenzeel | Guest 2: Annemarie Klaassen URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/annemarie-klaassen
